business.headline: Hyundai IPO: Check latest subscription and GMP on Day 1Hyundai Motor India IPO: India's biggest public offering opened for subscription on Monday, looking to raise Rs 27,870.16 crore with an offer for sale of 14.22 crore shares.

RIL shares dip 1% after Q2 results. What should investors do? Reliance Industries share price: The dip, driven by weaker-than-expected performance in its oil-to-chemicals (O2C) segment, has left investors and analysts contemplating their next move.

Hyundai IPO opens for subscription: Check GMP, price band, other key detailsHyundai Motor India IPO: The price band for the IPO has been set between Rs 1,865 and Rs 1,960 per share. Through this public offering, Hyundai aims to raise Rs 27,856 crore

Blinkit scraps 'zero notice' policy amid talent war in quick commerce: ReportThe change in policy comes in response to growing competition in the quick commerce industry as Blinkit faces stiff competition from other players like Zepto, Flipkart, and Swiggy.

Garuda Construction and Engineering listing: Book profit or hold?Garuda Construction and Engineering listing: Despite a sluggish outlook in the grey market, which had indicated a flat or negative listing, the company surprised many with its strong opening.

Garuda Construction and Engineering shares list at 10.5% premium at Rs 105Garuda Construction and Engineering IPO listing: The company's market debut has exceeded expectations, particularly given the flat to negative outlook in the grey market before the listing.

Nvidia inches closer to overtaking Apple as world's most valuable companyNvidia share price: The latest stock jump pushed Nvidia's market value to $3.39 trillion, just shy of Apple's $3.52 trillion, but ahead of Microsoft's $3.12 trillion.
Sensex, Nifty gain in early trade, RIL shares drop after Q2 resultsThe S&P BSE Sensex was up 194.75 points at 82,167.80 at around 9:39 am, while the NSE Nifty50 was up 38.30 points to 25,166.25.

RIL Q2 profit slips 5% to Rs 16,563 crore, still beats market expectationsRIL Q2 results: Reliance Industries beat street expectations in Q2 despite a 5% drop in profit, driven by strong digital and upstream growth.

HCLTech Q2 results: Net profit jumps 11% to Rs 4,235 crore, dividend declaredHCLTech declared another interim dividend of Rs 12 per share, taking the total interim dividend for the fiscal year so far to Rs 42 per share.

Retail inflation jumps to 9-month high of 5.49% in SeptemberFood prices saw an even more significant spike, with the Consumer Food Price Index (CFPI) recording a year-on-year inflation rate of 9.24%. Rural areas faced food inflation of 9.08%, while urban areas experienced an increase of 9.56%.

Hyundai Motor IPO opens tomorrow: Check latest GMP, brokerage reviews and moreHyundai Motor India IPO: Priced between Rs 1,865 and Rs 1,960 per share, the IPO is expected to raise Rs 27,856 crore through an offer for sale of 14.2 crore shares, representing a 17.5% stake.

Sensex ends 600 points higher, Nifty gains; Wipro, HDFC Bank stocks rallyThe S&P BSE Sensex was up 591.69 points to 81,973.05 at the closing bell, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 163.70 points to settle at 25, 127.95.

Daron Acemoglu, Simon Johnson, James A. Robinson awarded Nobel Economics Prize 2024Nobel Economics Prize 2024: This year's laureates provide valuable insights into how institutions are formed and their crucial role in fostering sustainable development and prosperity.

DA hike before Diwali? Big update for central government employeesDearness Allowance (DA) is revised twice a year, providing employees with financial support that helps maintain their purchasing power as living costs rise.

Gold, silver price today, October 14, 2024: Precious metals witness dip on MCXGold Price Today October 14, 2024: Both gold and silver are trading on the lower side of the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) on Monday. Check the latest city-wise prices here.

HDFC Bank shares rise 2% ahead of Q2 results. What should investors do? HDFC Bank share price: Investors are showing increased interest in HDFC Bank shares, anticipating a positive performance in the upcoming quarterly results.
Explained: Why DMart shares plunged 9% in early trade todayThe sharp decline in shares came after DMart's second-quarter earnings failed to meet the market's expectations.
Sensex jumps 500 points, Nifty above 25,000; Wipro, HDFC Bank gain The S&P BSE Sensex was up 409.75 points to 81,791.11 at 10:20 am, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 126.45 points to trade at 25,090.70.

Succession Wars: The Hinduja family's bitter battle for controlAt the heart of the Hinduja family's success was their ethos of shared ownership, but this same principle ultimately sparked their multi-billion dollar feud, endangering an empire built on unity.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: India, US sign Rs 32,000-crore deal for 31 Predator dronesThe development comes less than a month after Prime Minister Narendra Modi and US President Joe Biden held talks about the acquisition of the drones on the sidelines of the Quad Leaders' Summit held in Delaware.

Canada throws in 'Bishnoi gang' to push old charge against IndiaCanada alleged that Indian agents present on its soil are working with the Lawrence Bishnoi gang to target pro-Khalistan elements. Incidentally, the allegations come at a time when Lawrence Bishnoi is in the news in India for his alleged involvement in the murder of NCP leader Baba Siddique.

Brawl between NDA, Opposition MPs during Waqf bill panel meetingThe Opposition accused the BJP MPs of using offensive language against them and walked out of the meeting for the second consecutive day.

SCO Summit today in Pakistan, Islamabad in lockdown, S Jaishankar to attendExternal Affairs Minister S Jaishankar is set to land in Pakistan today to attend the two-day SCO meet. It's the first time in nearly nine years that an Indian foreign minister will travel to Pakistan.

How Trudeau turned Canada into naya Pakistan for IndiaAs India recalls its envoy from Ottawa and expels diplomats, it has demoted Canada to Pakistan's status. This is how Canada has been harbouring terrorists, resorting to the blame game to become the naya Pakistan.

10 Congress MLAs on the chopping block ahead of Maharashtra polls: SourcesAt least 10 sitting MLAs are likely to be left off the Congress's candidate list for the upcoming Maharashtra assembly elections, sources told India Today TV.

Two more detained in Baba Siddiqui murder case, cops looking for seventh accusedOne of the two people detained is Harish, who has a scrap shop in Pune, which was used by accused Dharmaraj Kashyap, 19, and Shivprasad Gautam. The second one is Anurag Kashyap, the brother of the arrested accused Dharmaraj Kashyap.

India, Canada discussed Bishnoi gang at secret meet, claims US reportIn the meeting, Ajit Doval acknowledged that Lawrence Bishnoi was capable of orchestrating violence from wherever he was incarcerated, according to a report in The Washington Post.

Ground Report: Israeli war journalist on how conflict with Lebanon has evolvedWhen asked how the current military operations of Israel in Lebabon in 2024 differ from those in 2006, Lenny highlighted a major advancement. "The biggest difference now is the Iron Dome system. Our air defense capabilities are far more advanced compared to 2006."

Rajasthan: The Royal Canvas for Dream WeddingsWhether it's the grandeur of a palace wedding in Udaipur, the mystique of a desert wedding in Jaisalmer, or the creativity of a themed wedding in Jaipur, Rajasthan offers a wedding experience that is truly out of the ordinary.

IIT Delhi's Technology & AI Leadership Programme: Shaping the Future of Tech LeadershipAdvance your career with IIT Delhi's Technology & AI Leadership Programme. Designed for aspiring tech leaders, this programme offers cutting-edge insights, practical experience, and strategic acumen to navigate the digital era. Gain the skills to drive innovation, lead digital transformations, and position yourself as a visionary in technology leadership.
Cost of asthma, tuberculosis, mental health drugs hiked by 50%India's drug pricing authority has hiked the prices of drugs for conditions like asthma, tuberculosis, and mental health.

With Olympics 2028 as goal, India's Zahabiya Merchant racing through obstaclesIn an exclusive interview with IndiaToday, Obstacle Course Racer Zahabiya Merchant discusses her dream of competing at the Los Angeles Olympics. The 27-year-old recalls how she fell in love with the sport.

India will not take 'undercooked' Mohammed Shami to Australia: Rohit SharmaIndia will not carry an injured Mohammed Shami to Australia in the Border-Gavaskar Trophy, said Rohit Sharma. Shami has been rehabilitating at the National Cricket Academy in Bengaluru since his ankle surgery.

Chennai rain alert: Heavy showers hit city, 5 flights cancelled, schools shut Live UpdatesTamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin has asked the information technology (IT) companies to allow their employees to work from home till October 18, amid a heavy rain alert.

Watch: Canada cops' self-goal on charges of India targeting Sikh CanadiansThe Royal Canadian Mounted Police seemingly shot itself in the foot with an inadvertent admission while detailing its investigation into Nijjar's murder and related cases and their links to "agents of the Indian government".

Manipur actor alleges discrimination by Jigra teamJust days after Divya Khossla accused the Jigra makers of manipulating box office figures, an actor from Northeast India came forward with allegations of discrimination.

Maharashtra, Jharkhand election dates to be announced today Live updatesThe Election Commission will announce the schedule for Assembly elections in Maharashtra and Jharkhand today. Besides the polls for the two assemblies, the poll panel can also announce bypolls for three Lok Sabha seats and 12 Assembly seats of UP and Gujarat.

Once-in-80,000-years comet visible in India. See pictures.The comet, which reached its closest approach to the Sun on September 28, 2024, is now moving away and becoming increasingly visible to Earth-bound observers.

Bahraich violence: Yogi Adityanath meets riot victim's family, situation tenseUttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath will meet the family of a 22-year-old man who was shot dead during a Goddess Durga idol immersion procession in Uttar Pradesh's Bahraich district. The local BJP MLA will also be present during the meeting.

How BJP won most votes but didn't win Jammu and KashmirThe Bharatiya Janata Party recorded a higher vote share than the National Conference. But it failed to break into the Valley even as it swept Jammu.

Who is protecting Lawrence Bishnoi? Trinamool MP to Centre on Canada's chargeSaket Gokhale questioned how Lawrence Bishnoi was able to allegedly carry out murders and extortion in India and abroad from jail.

Two state funerals and one lousy equation: Baba Siddique = Ratan TataTwo state funerals in Maharashtra show a stark contrast. On October 10, the state of Maharashtra accorded a state funeral to business titan, Ratan Tata, who put the nation first in all business ventures. Three days later, another funeral was given to three-time former MLA, Baba Siddique, whose biggest achievement was uniting the Khans. Questions are being asked why the two men have been given the same honours.

India has denied, obfuscated, attacked me personally: Trudeau on Nijjar killingCanadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau claimed authorities have 'clear and compelling evidence' that agents of the Indian government were involved in activities threatening public safety.

Citadel Honey Bunny trailer: Varun-Samantha's actioner looks funny and explosiveThe trailer of Citadel: Honey Bunny is here, and it is all things fun and action. The series, directed by Raj & DK, features Samantha and Varun Dhawan in main roles.

Rashmika Mandanna appointed as national ambassador for cyber safetyRashmika Mandanna has been named National Ambassador for Cyber Safety, spearheading a campaign to raise awareness about cyber threats. Her personal experience with cybercrime lends credibility to her role, as she aims to promote online safety across India.
One Piece to return with Egghead arc in April 2025. Read detailsToei Animation has announced a hiatus for One Piece. The anime will return in April 2025 with the Egghead arc.

When Ali Fazal said 3 Idiots 'sent him into depression': I was crushedAli Fazal, who portrayed the character of Joy Lobo in 3 Idiots, revealed in an old interview, that the role had a profound emotional impact on him, leading to a period of depression.

Jio Launches JioBharat V3 and V4 in India, price starts at Rs 1,099 Reliance Jio has launched the JioBharat V3 and V4 models at the India Mobile Congress 2024, priced at Rs 1,099, aiming to provide affordable 4G connectivity to 2G users in India.

Pixel 9 Pro pre-orders start October 17, listing goes live on Flipkart The Pixel 9 Pro, available for pre-orders from October 17 on Flipkart, promises to captivate tech enthusiasts with its advanced features and sleek design, priced at Rs 1,09,999 for the 16GB + 256GB variant.

iPhone SE 4 vs iPhone 16: Here is how Apple will make its new SE affordable Apple is likely to launch the new iPhone SE 4 in early 2025 offering a budget-friendly option with features from the premium iPhone 16 series.

WhatsApp bans over 80 lakh Indian accounts to deal with rising online scams WhatsApp has banned over 80 lakh Indian accounts to combat rising online scams and maintain platform integrity. The move is part of WhatsApp's ongoing efforts to tackle accounts involved in illegal activities or violating its terms of service.

Rohit hailed the pacer for his experience and said that Bumrah has always been part of the leadership group.

Tamil Nadu has best infrastructure: Unadkat hails drainage during Ranji matchSaurashtra captain Jaydev Unadkat hailed the drainage facilities of the Tamil Nadu Cricket Association. The ground was completely dried up despite a day off full of rain before that.

Stranded for 16 hours at airport, frustrated Nigeria pull out of match vs LibyaNigeria have pulled out of their Africa Cup of Nations qualifier in Libya and were heading home after being stranded for 16 hours at an airport, 250 kilometres away from the venue. Nigeria players made the incident public via their social media accounts.

OTD in 2021: CSK scripted redemption to win 4th IPL trophy, beat KKR in finalChennai Super Kings scripted their redemption by winning their 4th IPL title in Dubai. The MS Dhoni-led side beat Eoin Morgan's KKR in the final by 27 runs.

Babar Azam's stardom punctured? Sledging Room, S02 Ep 57On Sunday, the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) dropped a bombshell by leaving out former captain Babar Azam, along with fast bowling stars Shaheen Afridi and Naseem Shah, for the last two Tests against England. Watch: Virat Kohli interacts with young cricketers in Bengaluru, gives signed batStar batter Virat Kohli was seen interacting with youngsters at the Chinnaswamy stadium in Bengaluru ahead of the first Test against New Zealand, starting on October 16, Wednesday. Kohli will be key in the series for India as they prep for the Australia tour.

Kylian Mbappe, LaLiga president accuse FIFA of destroying football ecosystemA players' union, the European leagues' group, and Spain's LaLiga have jointly filed a complaint against FIFA over the abuse of schedule. The bodies have accused FIFA of abusing the schedule.

IND vs NZ: Bengaluru Test 'extra significant' for Rachin Ravindra due to rootsRachin Ravindra has said that the first Test between India and New Zealand in Bengaluru would be extra special for him because of his roots being firmly established in the city. Rachin's parents hail from the city while his grandparents still live here.

10-man France edge past Belgium, Germany beat NetherlandsRandal Kolo Muani scored a brace to help 10-man France edge past Belgium while Germany defeated Netherlands 1-0 in the UEFA Nations League on 14 October, Monday.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
